languages.text: "Благословенные технологии, выкованные слугами Омниссии, есть величайший дар Адептус Арбитес и знак функционального союза между нами".
"The blessed technologies forged by the servants of the Omnissiah are the greatest gift bestowed upon the Adeptus Arbites and a symbol of the functional alliance between us."
languages.original_text: "Благословенные технологии, выкованные слугами Омниссии, есть величайший дар Адептус Арбитес и знак функционального союза между нами".

traits.locale_text: "The blessed technologies forged by the servants of the Omnissiah are the greatest gift of the Adeptus Arbites and a symbol of the functional alliance between us."
"The blessed technologies forged by the servants of the Omnissiah are the greatest gift of the Adeptus Arbites and a symbol of the functional alliance between us."
"The blessed technologies forged by the servants of the Omnissiah are the greatest gift of the Adeptus Arbites and a symbol of the functional alliance between us."
"The blessed technologies forged by the servants of the Omnissiah are the greatest gift bestowed upon the Adeptus Arbites and a symbol of the functional alliance between us."
"The blessed technologies forged by the servants of the Omnissiah are the greatest gift bestowed upon the Adeptus Arbites and a symbol of the functional alliance between us."

languages.text: 「万機神の従者たちによって鍛えられた、祝福されし技術は、高等裁定局に授けられた最大の恩寵であり、自分たちの機能的な同盟の象徴でもある」
languages.original_text: "The blessed technologies forged by the servants of the Omnissiah are the greatest gift bestowed upon the Adeptus Arbites and a symbol of the functional alliance between us."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神の従者たちによって鍛えられた、祝福されし技術は、高等裁定局に授けられた最大の恩寵であり、自分たちの機能的な同盟の象徴でもある」

languages.text: "Die gesegneten Technologien, die von den Dienern des Omnissiah erschaffen wurden, sind das größte Geschenk, das der Adeptus Arbites je erhalten hat. Sie sind ein Symbol der funktionellen Allianz zwischen uns."
languages.original_text: "The blessed technologies forged by the servants of the Omnissiah are the greatest gift bestowed upon the Adeptus Arbites and a symbol of the functional alliance between us."

traits.locale_text: "Die gesegneten Technologien, die von den Dienern des Omnissiah erschaffen wurden, sind das größte Geschenk, das der Adeptus Arbites je erhalten hat. Sie sind ein Symbol der funktionellen Allianz zwischen uns."

languages.text: « Les technologies bénies forgées par les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie sont les plus grands dons conférés à l'Adeptus Arbites et un symbole de l'alliance fonctionnelle entre nous. »
languages.original_text: "The blessed technologies forged by the servants of the Omnissiah are the greatest gift bestowed upon the Adeptus Arbites and a symbol of the functional alliance between us."

traits.locale_text: « Les technologies bénies forgées par les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie sont les plus grands dons conférés à l'Adeptus Arbites et un symbole de l'alliance fonctionnelle entre nous. »

languages.text: «Las benditas tecnologías forjadas por los siervos del Omnissiah son el mayor de los dones concedidos al Adeptus Arbites y un símbolo de la alianza funcional entre nuestras instituciones».
languages.original_text: "The blessed technologies forged by the servants of the Omnissiah are the greatest gift bestowed upon the Adeptus Arbites and a symbol of the functional alliance between us."

traits.locale_text: «Las benditas tecnologías forjadas por los siervos del Omnissiah son el mayor de los dones concedidos al Adeptus Arbites y un símbolo de la alianza funcional entre nuestras instituciones».

languages.text: “由欧姆尼塞亚的仆人所锻造的祝福技术造物，是欧姆尼塞亚赐予法务部最大的礼物，也象征着我们之间卓有成效的联盟关系。”
languages.original_text: "The blessed technologies forged by the servants of the Omnissiah are the greatest gift bestowed upon the Adeptus Arbites and a symbol of the functional alliance between us."

traits.locale_text: “由欧姆尼塞亚的仆人所锻造的祝福技术造物，是欧姆尼塞亚赐予法务部最大的礼物，也象征着我们之间卓有成效的联盟关系。”

languages.text: "Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarınca dövülmüş kutsal teknolojiler, Adeptus Arbites'e bahşedilen en büyük armağan ve aramızdaki çıkar ittifakının bir simgesi."
languages.original_text: "The blessed technologies forged by the servants of the Omnissiah are the greatest gift bestowed upon the Adeptus Arbites and a symbol of the functional alliance between us."

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarınca dövülmüş kutsal teknolojiler, Adeptus Arbites'e bahşedilen en büyük armağan ve aramızdaki çıkar ittifakının bir simgesi."

languages.original_text: "The blessed technologies forged by the servants of the Omnissiah are the greatest gift bestowed upon the Adeptus Arbites and a symbol of the functional alliance between us."
